body.name: Dried Blue Lavender Flowers Bundle-Dried Preserved Lavender Bouquet 180+ Stems 15''-17" for Home Wedding Shower Vase Décor, Aromatherapy, Fragrance, Blue Décor , 2 Packs Live Plant
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 1 hr 41 mins
features: 💐Premium Quality Blue Lavender: Our lavender is handpicked from natural farms and treated with special Preserved technology to preserve its unique characteristics. Unlike regular dried lavender, the preserved lavender doesn't shed seeds and has a longer-lasting fragrance. The blue glycerin used in the immortality process is non-toxic and safe to use.

💐Two Bouquets of Lavender: You will receive two carefully selected and beautifully packaged bouquets of British Blue dried preserved lavender. Each bouquet measures 15-17 inches in length and contains 2.82oz (80g) of dried lavender. The larger quantity and weight of the preserved lavender make it perfect for various purposes. It retains more flower buds and has a stronger, longer-lasting fragrance that will uplift your mood.

💐Multifaceted Use: Lavender is known for its air-purifying properties, ability to clear the mind, reduce stress, and soothe the mood. Place the dried lavender bouquet in a vase and set it in your bathroom, bedroom, or living room to let the calming fragrance alleviate your fatigue. Pair it with dried eucalyptus leaves for a rejuvenating at-home spa experience.

💐Perfect Decorations and Gifts: The warm and simple British blue dried lavender bouquets are perfect for home, wedding, party, and bohemian-style decorations. You can use them to make wreaths, hair clips, wedding bouquets, and more, or combine them with other dried flowers to create unique styles of decoration. This preserved dried lavender bundle makes a perfect gift for friends, family, and loved ones.

💌Important Reminder: The preserved lavender doesn't require any watering or care. Avoid splashing or rinsing it with water to prevent any leakage. Please note that each bouquet is handmade and packaged, so slight differences in color and quantity may occur.
body.description: Dried Blue Preserved Lavender Bouquet What is a Preserved Lavender Bouquet 1. Dried preserved lavender bouquet, using unique preserved technology, replacing the moisture from lavender with blue cosmetic grade glycerin. Make it look like fresh lavender, retain the natural fragrance of lavender and prolong its service life. 2. The glycerin used is cosmetic grade, non-toxic and harmless, please feel free to use it. 3. Preserved lavender lasts longer than dry lavender, does not need to be taken care of, and will not drop seeds and will never wither. Product size: 15-17 inches Product Quantity: 300PCS Product Weight: 4.23oz Product Color: blue

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Premium Preserved Blue Lavender is the Perfect Material for Home Wedding Decorations and Handmade Arts. Dried organic blue lavender bouquets are rich in practical value 1. Pure natural organic blue lavender can be used as decoration in living room, kitchen, kitchen and bathroom etc... 2. Dried preserved lavender bouquets can also be used as wedding bouquets, wedding decorations, and DIY etc... 3. The smell of dried lavender bouquets can purify the air and relieve fatigue. You can use it to make sachets and bath bouquets to enjoy the ultimate comfortable home SPA. 4. Avoid getting lavender wet with water or soaking lavender directly in water when using it, which can prolong the life of lavender and retain a longer-lasting fragrance.
Blue wedding decor Wedding Bouquet Handmade Arts.

The natural scent of lavender has a wonderful soothing effect, which can help you purify the air, relieve the stress of the day, and have a relaxed and happy mood. Tip 1: When using it in the bathroom, avoid soaking it in water or rinsing it with water. Tip 2: The hot water vapor can stimulate the scent of lavender. However, it may also cause liquid to seep out. They are non-toxic and harmless, so please feel free to use them. Dried Blue Preserved Lavender Bouquet What is a Preserved Lavender Bouquet 1. Dried preserved lavender bouquet, using unique preserved technology, replacing the moisture from lavender with blue cosmetic grade glycerin. Make it look like fresh lavender, retain the natural fragrance of lavender and prolong its service life. 2. The glycerin used is cosmetic grade, non-toxic and harmless, please feel free to use it. 3. Preserved lavender lasts longer than dry lavender, does not need to be taken care of, and will not drop seeds and will never wither. Product size: 15-17 inches Product Quantity: 300PCS Product Weight: 4.23oz Product Color: blue

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: They smell alright, and they look great. However, little pieces fall off randomly. Not normally a problem. Well, my living room end tables are white, these are in vases on said tables. The little flowers that fell off got wet and the artificial blue dye stained the surface of my end tables. I tried scrubbing with every type of soap I have and it's permanent. I'll have to repaint my end tables.*The seller made things right which was very kind of them, they also said they're working on eliminating this dye transfer problem. I am willing to try them again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This package of dried blue lavender blew my expectations out of the water! They are absolutely beautiful and smell amazing! Will definitely be ordering again in the future!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Not as fragrant as I had hoped

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these Dried Flowers
reviews.reviewText: The smell is fantastic, and the dried flowers look amazing! Are very delicate though so you definitely want to place them once and that's it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and fragrant
reviews.reviewText: The lavender is dyed a dark blue. Flowers are sturdy and had good strong straight stems. I would and likely will by again from this supplier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So much for 4 - I got 2 when I ordered 4. RIP OFF!!! DO NOT BUY. Loads smaller than advertised . Don’t waste your money

reviews.reviewText: The smell is a little strong in the beginning, however lessens in a few days and still smell great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Created small displays around the house. Very colorful. The fragrance was a bit much when I first opened them so placed them in the garage for a few days and it dissipated. All stems and leaves in place. Arrived well packaged.
